entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marieville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Acadie 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
